text: La Chapelle-Basse-Mer is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Loire-Atlantique department in western France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Divatte-sur-Loire.Arrêté préfectoral 20 October 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Loire-Atlantique
title: La Chapelle-Basse-Mer
